creator: Eliza Gkritsi, Nelson Wang
title: Bitcoin Miner Argo Blockchain Says It's Close to Restructuring Without Having to Declare Bankruptcy
dc:creator: Eliza Gkritsi, Nelson Wang
content: The London-based company warned, however, that there's no reassurance it will be able to do so.

title: Argo Blockchain provides update on liquidity, in advanced talks to sell certain assets

creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
title: Price analysis 12/12: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, DOT
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
content: Cryptocurrency and stock markets could see a sharp spike in volatility due to this week’s CPI print, interest rate hike and a conference from Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell.
